name: info
description:
The info command displays a quick summary of an OSM file. Shows:

- File size
- Node and way counts
- Tagged element counts
- Bounding box
- Top tags

Faster than full stats - useful for quick file inspection.
output:
File information including:
- File name and size
- Node count (total and tagged)
- Way count (total and tagged)
- Bounding box coordinates
- Top 5 most common tags
examples: for f in *.osm; do osmfast info "$f" --oneline; done
